```{r}
simplified_demo <- county_demographics_cleanish %>%
  mutate(county = str_remove(county, pattern = "\\\\")) %>%
  mutate(county = str_replace_all(county, "�", "n")) %>% # removing special character
  mutate(state = if_else(is.na(state), "DC", state)) %>% # adding DC as a state for county = district of columbia
  mutate(county = if_else(county == "petersburg borough", "petersburg census area", county)) %>%
  distinct(county, state) 


simplified_sti <- sti_infections %>%
  mutate(county = if_else(county == "doña ana county", "dona ana county", county)) %>%
  distinct(county, state)

anti_join(simplified_sti, simplified_demo, by = c("county", "state")) # reveal counties not in demo data
```
